name: PhasmoRPG
description:
A mostly automated version of Nuzzgard's PhasmoRPG. But with some added Options, like Multiplayer, and various difficulty options for character respawns and equipment rewards.

Warning: This is Designed for use alongside Phasmophobia, Not Included.

  1. Setup the mission in the RPG
  2. Run the mission in Phasmophobia
  3. Enter results back into the RPG
  4. Gain your rewards.
  5. Repeat.

This works on the honor system as it is a separate program. I feel it is safe to assume the most fun will occur if the entered results are accurate.

Phasmophobia: https://store.steampowered.com/app/739630/Phasmophobia/

Nuzzgard: https://www.youtube.com/c/Nuzzgard/featured
